casebody.data:
No. 09-1124. Antonio Guevara Mendoza, Individually and as Surviving Father of Carolina Guevara Rodriguez, Deceased, et al., Petitioners v. Bridgestone Firestone North American Tire, LLC, et al. 561 U.S. 1006, 130 S. Ct. 3467,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1055,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5087. June 21, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 591 F.3d 406.
